data.message: Same here, why not working and now deadline extended till end of September? Confused! But the supermarket doesn't have any left with summer locations on. Help me!

replies.message: Hi Bruni, we're sorry to hear this. The website seems to be up and running. The main promotion has now ended but there will be a bonus draw 30/09/17. We'd recommend clearing the cookies on your browser before trying to enter again. If you need any more help please call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1) to hep you troubleshoot. Thanks
Hey Bruni, we didn't hear from you. Please could you send us a private message with your email and the codes you were trying to enter, so that we look into this for you? Thanks
